price: आज मत बिलबिलाओ। निःसंदेह तुम्हें हमारी ओर से कोई सहायता नहीं मिलेगी।
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
